title: Story And Tracklist Revealed: Thala Ajith's Vedalam Is A Horror Flick?
text:
Posted by: Avinash Gopinath Updated: Wednesday, October 14, 2015, 13:26 [IST] 
According to the latest buzz, Thala Ajith 's Vedalam might be the Veeram star's first ever horror flick. Yes, a report that was sidelined at the beginning has some backing now in the form of a story. 
A report has it that Ajith's sister, played by Lakshmi Menon , gets killed by some baddies. When her spirit enters Ajith's body, the usually calm and collected Ajith transforms into an almost insane, powerful entity. 
The story then showcases how Ajith, accompanied by his sister's spirit, avenge her murder and wipes out everyone responsible for his sister's death. 
If this story, which is doing the rounds quite vigorously, turns out to be true then we could well be witnessing Ajith in his first horror film, thanks to director Siva. 
This also explains the film's ghastly title and Ajith's hysterical voice modulation in the recently released teaser. Also, the teaser actually looks like it belongs to a horror flick. 
Well, horror flick or not, Ajith fans are geared up to celebrate this year's Diwali with a bang. As of now, it is said that the film might release on November 10th but the exact release date is still awaited as it remains to be confirmed officially by the makers. 
Check out the slides below to know about the film's complete tracklist (unofficial). Story And Tracklist Revealed: Thala Ajith's Vedalam Is A Horror Flick? 1/7 'Vetri Vinayagam' 
So the first song actually refers to Ajith's character name in Veeram . This might also be his introduction song in Vedalam . Story And Tracklist Revealed: Thala Ajith's Vedalam Is A Horror Flick? 2/7 'Getha Udathey' 
The song teaser which will be released tonight belongs to this particular track. It is speculated that this song is sung by Anirudh and will have Badshah's rap portion as well. Story And Tracklist Revealed: Thala Ajith's Vedalam Is A Horror Flick? 3/7 'Anbe Po' 
This song could be a duet involving Ajith and Shruti Haasan or it might also be a song dedicated to Ajith's on-screen sister, Lakshmi Menon. Story And Tracklist Revealed: Thala Ajith's Vedalam Is A Horror Flick? 4/7 'En Aaruyire' 
This definitely sounds like a duet track. Remember a song was shot at some alluring locations in Italy? This could be it. Story And Tracklist Revealed: Thala Ajith's Vedalam Is A Horror Flick? 5/7 Vedalam Theme 
And this is the much talked about Vedalam theme which is also referred as 'theri theme' by music director Anirudh Ravichander. Story And Tracklist Revealed: Thala Ajith's Vedalam Is A Horror Flick? 6/7 Trailer Along With The Album?
